title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2000.3 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2000.3 - Scope

State Regulations

Parts 2000 through 2002 apply to all applications for
grants-in-aid for the acquisition of lands for neighborhood park purposes
within a municipality of the State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2000.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
